problem_text_cn: 如图,已知BC与⊙O相切于点B,CO的延长线交⊙O于点A,连接AB,⊙O的半径为3,∠C=30°,则AC的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that BC is tangent to ⊙O at point B, the extended of CO intersects ⊙O at point A, connect AB, the radius of ⊙O is N_0, ∠C = N_1, then the length of AC is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示,连接OB,∵BC与⊙O相切于点B∴OB⊥BC∵⊙O的半径为3,∠C=30°∴OC=6,OA=3∴AC=9故选:B．
